verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G4253>before<s%> the <S%G1859>Feast<s%> of the <S%G3957>Passover,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3609>knowing<s%> that His <S%G5610>hour<s%> had <S%G2064>come<s%> that He should <S%G3327>depart<s%> out of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%> to the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> having <S%G25>loved<s%> His <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> were in the <S%G2889>world,<s%> He <S%G25>loved<s%> them to the <S%G5056>end.<s%>

And <S%G1096>during<s%> <S%G1173>supper,<s%> the <S%G1228>devil<s%> having <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G906>put<s%> into the <S%G2588>heart<s%> of <S%G2455>Judas<s%> <S%G2469>Iscariot,<s%> [the son] of <S%G4613>Simon,<s%> to <S%G3860>betray<s%> Him,

[Jesus,] <S%G3609>knowing<s%> that the <S%G3962>Father<s%> had <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>things<s%> into His <S%G5495>hands,<s%> and that He had <S%G1831>come<s%> <S%G1831>forth<s%> from <S%G2316>God,<s%> and was <S%G5217>going<s%> <S%G5217>back<s%> to <S%G2316>God,<s%>

<S%G1453>rose<s%> from <S%G1173>supper,<s%> and <S%G5087>laid<s%> <S%G5087>aside<s%> His <S%G2440>garments;<s%> and <S%G2983>taking<s%> a <S%G3012>towel,<s%> He <S%G1241>girded<s%> <S%G1438>Himself<s%> <S%G1241>about.<s%>

<S%G1534>Then<s%> He <S%G906>poured<s%> <S%G5204>water<s%> into the <S%G3537>basin,<s%> and <S%G757>began<s%> to <S%G3538>wash<s%> the disciples' <S%G4228>feet,<s%> and to <S%G1591>wipe<s%> them with the <S%G3012>towel<s%> with <S%G3739>which<s%> He was <S%G1241>girded.<s%>
And <S%G3767>so<s%> He <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter.<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> do You <S%G3538>wash<s%> my <S%G4228>feet<s%>?"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G3739>"What<s%> I <S%G4160>do<s%> you do not <S%G3609>realize<s%> <S%G737>now,<s%> but you shall <S%G1097>understand<s%> <S%G3326>hereafter.<s%> <S%G3778><s%>"

<S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G3756>"Never<s%> <S%G3361><s%> shall You <S%G3538>wash<s%> my <S%G4228>feet!<s%>" <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> him, <S%G1437>"If<s%> I do not <S%G3538>wash<s%> you, you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3313>part<s%> with Me."
<S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> not my <S%G4228>feet<s%> <S%G3440>only,<s%> but <S%G2532>also<s%> my <S%G5495>hands<s%> and my <S%G2776>head.<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, "He who has <S%G3068>bathed<s%> <S%G5532>needs<s%> <S%G3756>only<s%> <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3361><s%> to <S%G3538>wash<s%> his <S%G4228>feet,<s%> but is <S%G3650>completely<s%> <S%G2513>clean;<s%> and you are <S%G2513>clean,<s%> but not <S%G3956>all<s%> [of you.]"
For He <S%G3609>knew<s%> the one who was <S%G3860>betraying<s%> Him; for <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1223>reason<s%> He <S%G3004>said,<s%> "Not <S%G3956>all<s%> of you are <S%G2513>clean.<s%>"

And <S%G3767>so<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> He had <S%G3538>washed<s%> their <S%G4228>feet,<s%> and <S%G2983>taken<s%> His <S%G2440>garments,<s%> and <S%G377>reclined<s%> [at the table] <S%G3825>again,<s%> He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "Do you <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> I have <S%G4160>done<s%> to you?
"You <S%G5455>call<s%> Me <S%G1320>Teacher<s%> and <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> and you are <S%G2573>right,<s%> for [so] I <S%G1510>am.<s%>

<S%G1487>"If<s%> I <S%G3767>then,<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> and the <S%G1320>Teacher,<s%> <S%G3538>washed<s%> your <S%G4228>feet,<s%> you <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3784>ought<s%> to <S%G3538>wash<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> another's <S%G4228>feet.<s%>
"For I <S%G1325>gave<s%> you an <S%G5262>example<s%> that you <S%G2532>also<s%> should <S%G4160>do<s%> as I <S%G4160>did<s%> to you.

<S%G281>"Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, a <S%G1401>slave<s%> is not <S%G3173>greater<s%> than his <S%G2962>master;<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> [is] <S%G652>one<s%> who is <S%G652>sent<s%> <S%G3173>greater<s%> than the one who <S%G3992>sent<s%> him.
<S%G1487>"If<s%> you <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G3778>things,<s%> you are <S%G3107>blessed<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> you <S%G4160>do<s%> them.

"I do not <S%G3004>speak<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> of you. I <S%G3609>know<s%> the <S%G5100>ones<s%> I have <S%G1586>chosen;<s%> but [it is] that the <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> may be <S%G4137>fulfilled,<s%> 'He who <S%G5176>eats<s%> My <S%G740>bread<s%> has <S%G1869>lifted<s%> up his <S%G4418>heel<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> Me.'

"From <S%G737>now<s%> on I am <S%G3004>telling<s%> you <S%G4253>before<s%> [it] <S%G1096>comes<s%> to <S%G1096>pass,<s%> <S%G2443>so<s%> that <S%G3752>when<s%> it does <S%G1096>occur,<s%> you may <S%G4100>believe<s%> that I <S%G1510>am<s%> [He.]

<S%G281>"Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, he who <S%G2983>receives<s%> <S%G302>whomever<s%> <S%G5100><s%> I <S%G3992>send<s%> <S%G2983>receives<s%> Me; and he who <S%G2983>receives<s%> Me <S%G2983>receives<s%> Him who <S%G3992>sent<s%> Me."

When <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3778>this,<s%> He became <S%G5015>troubled<s%> in <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> and <S%G3140>testified,<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G281>"Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, that <S%G1520>one<s%> of you will <S%G3860>betray<s%> Me."
The <S%G3101>disciples<s%> [began] <S%G991>looking<s%> at <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> at a <S%G639>loss<s%> [to know] of <S%G5101>which<s%> <S%G5101>one<s%> He was <S%G3004>speaking.<s%>
There was <S%G345>reclining<s%> on <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>' <S%G2859>breast<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of His <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> Jesus <S%G25>loved.<s%>

<S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3506>gestured<s%> to him, and <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G3004>"Tell<s%> [us] <S%G5101>who<s%> it is of <S%G3739>whom<s%> He is <S%G3004>speaking.<s%>"
He, <S%G377>leaning<s%> <S%G377>back<s%> <S%G3779>thus<s%> on Jesus' <S%G4738>breast,<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> is it?"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> "That is the one for <S%G3739>whom<s%> I shall <S%G911>dip<s%> the <S%G5596>morsel<s%> and <S%G1325>give<s%> it to him." <S%G3767>So<s%> when He had <S%G911>dipped<s%> the <S%G5596>morsel,<s%> He <S%G2983>took<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> it to <S%G2455>Judas,<s%> [the son] of <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G2469>Iscariot.<s%>

And <S%G3326>after<s%> the <S%G5596>morsel,<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> into him. <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to him, <S%G3739>"What<s%> you <S%G4160>do,<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G5036>quickly.<s%>"

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>one<s%> of <S%G3588>those<s%> <S%G345>reclining<s%> [at the table] <S%G1097>knew<s%> for <S%G5101>what<s%> purpose He had <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> to him.

For <S%G5100>some<s%> were <S%G1380>supposing,<s%> <S%G1893>because<s%> <S%G2455>Judas<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G1101>money<s%> <S%G1101>box,<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was <S%G3004>saying<s%> to him, <S%G59>"Buy<s%> the things we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> of for the <S%G1859>feast<s%>"; <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2228>else,<s%> that he should <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G5100>something<s%> to the <S%G4434>poor.<s%>
And <S%G3767>so<s%> after <S%G2983>receiving<s%> the <S%G5596>morsel<s%> he <S%G1831>went<s%> out <S%G2117>immediately;<s%> and it was <S%G3571>night.<s%>

<S%G3753>When<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> he had <S%G1831>gone<s%> out, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3568>"Now<s%> is the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> <S%G1392>glorified,<s%> and <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G1392>glorified<s%> in Him;

<S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G1392>glorified<s%> in Him, <S%G2316>God<s%> will <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1392>glorify<s%> Him in <S%G846>Himself,<s%> and will <S%G1392>glorify<s%> Him <S%G2117>immediately.<s%>

" <S%G5040>Little<s%> <S%G5040>children,<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> with you a <S%G3398>little<s%> <S%G3398>while<s%> <S%G2089>longer.<s%> You shall <S%G2212>seek<s%> Me; and as I <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> I <S%G737>now<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> to you <S%G2532>also,<s%> <S%G3699>'Where<s%> I am <S%G5217>going,<s%> you <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1831>come.<s%>'

"A <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> I <S%G1325>give<s%> to you, that you <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> <S%G2531>even<s%> as I have <S%G25>loved<s%> you, that you <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another.<s%>

" By <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>men<s%> will <S%G1097>know<s%> that you are My <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> for <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another.<s%>"

<S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> are You <S%G5217>going<s%>?" <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> <S%G3699>"Where<s%> I <S%G5217>go,<s%> you <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G190>follow<s%> Me <S%G3568>now;<s%> but you shall <S%G190>follow<s%> <S%G5305>later.<s%>"

<S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G1223>why<s%> <S%G5101><s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> I not <S%G190>follow<s%> You <S%G737>right<s%> <S%G737>now<s%>? I will <S%G5087>lay<s%> <S%G5087>down<s%> my <S%G5590>life<s%> for You."

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> "Will you <S%G5087>lay<s%> <S%G5087>down<s%> your <S%G5590>life<s%> for Me? <S%G281>Truly,<s%> <S%G281>truly,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, a <S%G220>cock<s%> shall not <S%G5455>crow,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> you <S%G720>deny<s%> Me <S%G5151>three<s%> <S%G5151>times.<s%>
